label: Announced Year
description: the Date when the Policy Announced

label: Type of Legislation
description: How the legislation is officially identified: Act, Agreement, Decree, Guidelines, Law, Order.

label: Policy Type/Area
description: It is categorising return related legislation according to its focus or scope. Legislations could be related to pre-return stage such as asylum procedures, irregularity residence criteria and pre-removal detentions. They could also be about procedures during return, such as forced or assisted returns or mass expulsions.
